bookmarkedResources.title: VPC Deep Dive for Solutions Architects
bookmarkedResources.description: Comprehensive coverage of VPC concepts including subnets, route tables, NAT gateways, and VPC peering for the SA-A03 exam.

bookmarkedResources.title: Spring Boot with AWS SDK v2 Examples
bookmarkedResources.description: Java code samples using Spring Boot with AWS SDK v2 for S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and SQS integration patterns.

allResources.title: Solutions Architect Practice Exam #3
allResources.description: Full-length practice exam with detailed explanations. Covers all SA-A03 domains with emphasis on security and cost optimization.

allResources.title: Building a Serverless Web Application
allResources.description: Step-by-step lab building a serverless app with Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, and S3. Includes Python code samples.

allResources.title: AWS Well-Architected Framework
allResources.description: Essential reading covering the 6 pillars: operational excellence, security, reliability, performance, cost optimization, and sustainability.

allResources.title: EC2 Instance Types Complete Guide
allResources.description: Official AWS documentation covering all EC2 instance families, use cases, and selection criteria for different workloads.

allResources.title: AWS Lambda with Java and Spring Boot
allResources.description: Advanced Lambda development using Java 11+ and Spring Boot with custom runtimes, performance optimization, and best practices.

allResources.title: Python Boto3 AWS Automation Scripts
allResources.description: Collection of Python scripts for automating AWS tasks: EC2 management, S3 operations, CloudWatch monitoring, and cost reporting.
